artist: Engraver: Lucas Vorsterman, the Elder; Painter: After Nicolaas van der Horst
description: bust facing left looking at viewer; wearing armor, ruff and sash; in an oval with angels and allegorical figures around it
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

In oval: JEAN CONTE DE TILLY, GENERAL DES PARIES DE SE MAIESTE IMPERIAL | in cartouche below image : six lines in French verse: Alexandre Cesar Scipion .../... est tous quatre ensemble | in image lower corners: N. Vander Horst in.   Lucas Vorsterman scu. | on sheet in pencil: 2-574
title: Portrait of Jean T'Serclaes
